name: Biosphere
description: '''Geir Aule Jenssen''' (born 30 May 1962) is a Norwegian [[electronic music]]ian and composer who records as '''Biosphere'''. A resident of [[Troms√∏]] within the [[Arctic Circle]], Jenssen is well known for [[Ambient music|ambient]] and [[ambient house]] pieces, often inspired by Arctic or mountain settings, and his use of [[music loop|loops]] and peculiar samples from science fiction and natural sources. His 1997 album ''[[Substrata (album)|Substrata]]'' was voted by the users of the [[Hyperreal.org]] website in 2001 as the best all-time classic [[ambient music|ambient]] album. He has also composed several film scores.
